author: Simon Difford
description: Originally created made by stirring 2 shots of Johnnie Walker King George V with 1 shot of Drambuie The Royal Legacy Of 1745 and 1 dash Peychaud's aromatic bitters. This original version really was a case of two British Royals being embittered by an American and excellent it was too.
name: Royal Nail
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Highland single malt scotch whisky

recipeInstructions.text: STIR ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
